name: Office robber
description:
Ludum Dare 40 : Office Robber

A game about robbing office supply

The more valuable the item you steal,the slower you will be able to walk. You can shoot the items out of your inventory to lighten your pocket ;) Be sure to avoid annoying co-workers and get out in time or you will lose!

————–Unfortunately we didn’t manage to implement everything in time——————–

Here is a list of stuff you CAN DO at the moment:

  • Move around,
  • pick up items,

List of stuff we have to polish:

  • Throw items
  • Enemy patrols
  • Doors
  • Item value/weight system.
  • Lock camera

We hope we can finish this up in our free time and have atleats one solid map

Thanks for playing!
